item.title: GM
item.description: score:244 Chances: General Motors is making significant efforts to maintain its position in the electric vehicle market by quickly addressing the temporary loss of U.S. electric vehicle tax credit eligibility for the Cadillac Lyriq and Chevrolet Blazer EV. The adoption of Tesla’s EV charging standard by Volkswagen AG may have implications for the EV market and could potentially impact the competitiveness of other automakers, including General Motors.
